title: Ships with petrol, gas arrive at port
body_lines: Two freighters with LP gas and petrol have sailed into the Colombo port, LITRO Gas Lanka Limited and the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC) have confirmed it.
Both these companies have also confirmed that the unloading process have already begun.
Meanwhile, LITRO said that two more shipments with 3,500 MT of LP gas are expected to reach the shores in the coming week.
